title: On The Debate: Danny Murphy, Gary Rowett and Dennis Wise
description: Join us for The Debate this week as our guests tackle the big football talking points.
content: David Prutton will be in the hot-seat on Monday, with guests Danny Murphy, Henry Winter and Christian Purslow.Scott Minto will then be presenting as he's joined by Liam Rosenior and Craig Bellamy on Tuesday, before Geoff Shreeves takes the hot-seat, with Ian Wright and Dennis Wise on Wednesday, and Tim Sherwood on Thursday.Monday 8thTuesday 9thWednesday 10thThursday 11thFriday 12thWatch The Debate at 10pm on Sky Sports Premier League.
